weapons.name: Ani-Mines
weapons.function: Deploys timed explosives on the ground in a ring.
weapons.evolve_effect: The initial explosions release additional explosions.

weapons.name: Anti-Shark Sea Mine
weapons.function: Launches a mine that bounces between enemies.
weapons.evolve_effect: The mine bounces endlessly so long as a new target is found.

weapons.name: Battle Bunny Crossbow
weapons.function: Fires a cone of arrows in a random direction. Arrows pierce their target upon critically striking.
weapons.evolve_effect: Fires a fan of many, many knives instead.

weapons.name: Blade-o-rang
weapons.function: Fires returning blades at the nearest enemy.
weapons.evolve_effect: Blades explode into smaller ones.

weapons.name: Bunny Mega-Blast
weapons.function: Launches orbital strikes at random enemies.
weapons.evolve_effect: Launches a barrage of orbital strikes at random enemies, ending with a massive one.

weapons.name: Cyclonic Slicers
weapons.function: Orbiting razors damage and knock back enemies.
weapons.evolve_effect: Razors now permanently orbit.

weapons.name: Echoing Batblades
weapons.function: Fires piercing spikes that bounce off terrain.
weapons.evolve_effect: Damage increases with each bounce.

weapons.name: Final City Transit
weapons.function: Pet trains occasionally appear and drive through enemies.
weapons.evolve_effect: Trains now generate explosions in their wake and knock up enemies. Enemies slain by the train have a chance to drop Gold.

weapons.name: Gatling Bunny-Guns
weapons.function: Deals area damage over time in a cone.
weapons.evolve_effect: Enemies hit are slowed and eventually stunned.

weapons.name: Iceblast Armor
weapons.function: Grants an icy armor that blocks the next damage then freezes surrounding enemies.
weapons.evolve_effect: Grants an icy armor that blocks the next damage then grants a shield. When gaining the shield and when it is destroyed or expires, freezes surrounding enemies.

weapons.name: Lioness's Lament
weapons.function: Fires crescent-shaped projectiles horizontally in two opposite directions.
weapons.evolve_effect: Fires beams of light horizontally in the two opposite directions.

weapons.name: Paw Print Poisoner
weapons.function: Leaves a damaging poison cloud behind while moving.
weapons.evolve_effect: Leaves a damaging poison cloud behind while moving which grants stacking Move Speed and a stacking shield based on the damage dealt.

weapons.name: Radiant Field
weapons.function: A solar field damages nearby enemies.
weapons.evolve_effect: Enemies that die within the field erupt, dealing damage in an area around them.

weapons.name: Searing Shortbow
weapons.function: Shoots blazing arrows that sear random zones on the ground.
weapons.evolve_effect: Seared zones' size and damage grows over their lifespan.

weapons.name: Statikk Sword
weapons.function: Fires a lightning shock that bounces between high-health enemies.
weapons.evolve_effect: A lightning storm is created in an area around shocked enemies for a short duration.

weapons.name: T.I.B.B.E.R.S
weapons.function: Summons a pet Robo-Tibbers. Robo-Tibbers swipes, dealing damage in an area. Robo-Tibbers focuses on enemies with the highest absolute current health.
weapons.evolve_effect: The improved model of Robo-Tibbers: larger, faster, and deals more damage.

weapons.name: The Annihilator
weapons.function: Clears the area. Long cooldown.
weapons.evolve_effect: All enemies slain by the strike drop bigger EXP Orbs and have a chance to drop several Gold.

weapons.name: UwU Blaster
weapons.function: Rapidly fires laser shots at the nearest enemy, dealing damage to the first enemy hit.
weapons.evolve_effect: Fires twice as fast.

weapons.name: Vortex Glove
weapons.function: Fires a stream of orbs which hit all enemies in their path. The stream constantly rotates clockwise.
weapons.evolve_effect: Fires an additional stream of orbs that constantly rotates counter-clockwise.

weapons.name: YuumiBot
weapons.function: Summons a pet Yuum.AI drone. Yuum.AI damages and knocks up enemies, and also gathers EXP Orbs.
weapons.evolve_effect: The drone now drops a healing pack after attaining a certain amount of damage to enemies.
